mapper.select: select seq,title,writer,content,regDate,cnt from board where seq = #{seq}
select seq,title,writer,content,regDate,cnt from board order by seq desc

select seq,title,writer,content,regDate,cnt from board where 1=1
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
order by seq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(SEQ, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT) VALUES(#{seq},#{title},#{writer},#{content});
mapper.update: update BOARD set TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE seq = #{seq};
update BOARD set CNT = (CNT+1) WHERE seq = #{seq};
